about_the_game:
It's Dungeon time is a simple 2d-puzzle casual game.

Work your way downwards in a stenched and decaying dungeon.
Fight off the hostile rats, skeletons and other undeads.

Collect gold coins, gather xp, level-up, upgrade equipment and specialize the character with specific skills to be able to descend deeper into the dungeon.

Sword bricks are used to attack the different creatures of the dungeon.

At the moment 3 levels are playable.
Get at least 1 star on a level to unlock the next one, - each with its own set of creatures and wildlife. Sewers, Cave and Crypt are unlocked from the start - the actual Underworld itself unlocks in a later patch.

The game is set in the same background and lore as Divilixa.
It is also inspired by games such as the Diablo-series and Dungeon Raid.

Descend deep into the dungeon, and strike deep into the core of darkness.

Become the saviour that the world crieth for.
Fight the darkness.

content_descriptors.notes: Crude texts about carnage, massacre or degraded mental conditions. Sometimes swearing or cursing. Blood splatter effects from monsters dead.

detailed_description:
It's Dungeon time is a simple 2d-puzzle casual game.

Work your way downwards in a stenched and decaying dungeon.
Fight off the hostile rats, skeletons and other undeads.

Collect gold coins, gather xp, level-up, upgrade equipment and specialize the character with specific skills to be able to descend deeper into the dungeon.

Sword bricks are used to attack the different creatures of the dungeon.

At the moment 3 levels are playable.
Get at least 1 star on a level to unlock the next one, - each with its own set of creatures and wildlife. Sewers, Cave and Crypt are unlocked from the start - the actual Underworld itself unlocks in a later patch.

The game is set in the same background and lore as Divilixa.
It is also inspired by games such as the Diablo-series and Dungeon Raid.

Descend deep into the dungeon, and strike deep into the core of darkness.

name: It's Dungeon Time!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Graphics: 1366x768 min resolution - recommended graphics card with 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: In general all 16:9 and 16:10 screen resolutions are supported. Even though the game could work on other screen resolutions - it is not guaranteed that things will look decent. Playing the game on lower than 1366x768 is dissuaded.

short_description: It's Dungeon Time is a simple 2d puzzle casual game. Start out with the simple soldier or warrior class. Descend into the dungeon and survive against hoards of skeletons, zombies and other creatures.
